cz.zcu.kiv.dfs_simulator.model.connection

Class ModelNodeConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.zcu.kiv.dfs_simulator.model.connection.ModelNodeConnection

  • public class ModelNodeConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    Oriented connection between two instances of ModelNode.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ModelNodeConnection(ModelNode origin, ModelNode neighbour, ByteSpeed bandwidth, int latency)
      Constructs new connection originating from origin to neighbour with bandwidth set by bandwidth and latency latency in ms.
      ModelNodeConnection(ModelNode origin, ModelNode neighbour, ByteSpeed bandwidth, int latency, ConnectionCharacteristic characteristic)
      Constructs new connection originating from origin to neighbour with bandwidth set by bandwidth, latency latency in ms and throughput modified by characteristic.
